text: Atu nabiyow ayti-maleela (cakki maabbak Yalli ayti kak alfe mara kinnuk) taysabbem duddaa? Hinnay inti-maleelaa (cakki mabuluk Yalli inti kak alfeh yan mara kinnuk) kee baxxaqqa iyye makkootiyyih addat yan mara tirri haytam duddaa?ken tirto kol matan cagalah kol tanim diini ken guddussaam√¢ kal
